subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Tammi's daughter has been located.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
I am relieved they recieved that closure and my heart goes out to them in thier time of grief.

Misty


--- On Sat, 9/27/08, Kristin <ckmorris95@...> wrote:

> From: Kristin <ckmorris95@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Tammi's daughter has been located.
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Saturday, September 27, 2008, 3:21 PM
> Tammi wants everyone to know that her step-daughter
> Nina's body has
> been located and how grateful she was to everyone who
> helped with
> messages and prayers.
> 
> Please keep Tammi and her family in your prayers as they go
> through
> this tough process.
> Kristin
